amendment.description: Amendment requires the development and implementation of a comprehensive energy conservation plan for facilities administered by Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to mandate the establishment of a energy conservation plan for the Congressional buildings administered by the Architect of the Capitol, thus bringing Congress into compliance with the energy efficiency standards established under the Energy Policy Relief Act of 1992.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gutierrez amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
